name: Backpack
traits: Backpack: Holds everything you need to travel.

name: Bumblebeer Glove
traits: Bumblebeer Glove: Used to avoid irritating the delicate paws of demanding pet bumblebees.

name: Carriage
traits: Carriage: A large carriage which holds up to 8 littlings.

name: Cart
traits: Cart: A practical cart or buggy which holds up to 4 littlings.

name: Clean Clothes
traits: Clean Clothes: Washing or changing clothes.

name: Cloak
traits: Cloak: Protects you from the cold and gives you an air of mystery.

name: Cooking Kit
traits: Cooking Kit: Helpful to cook in the open.

name: Dinner Out
traits: Dinner Out: Dinner out in a tavern or restaurant for one littling.

name: Disguise Kit
traits: Disguise Kit: Helpful to make disguises.

name: Doctor's Bag
traits: Doctor's Bag: Helpful to treat wounds or illnesses.

name: Elegant Clothes
traits: Elegant Clothes: Allow you to be Elegant.

name: Fire Starter
traits: Fire Starter: Helpful to light a small fire.

name: Gala Clothes
traits: Gala Clothes: Allow you to be Pompous.

name: Grappling Hook and Line
traits: Grappling Hook and Line: Helpful to climb.

name: Jewels
traits: Jewels: Rings, necklaces, bracelets, carved pipes, tiaras, and so on.

name: Lantern
traits: Lantern: Helpful to see in the dark. Hindering to going undetected in the dark.

name: Lockpicks
traits: Lockpicks: Helpful to pick locks.

name: Musical Instrument
traits: Musical Instrument: Helpful when performing or making noise.

name: Pack Snail
traits: Pack Snail: Helpful to carry heavy or bulky loads.

name: Saddle Animal
traits: Saddle Animal: A Mouse or Beetle you can mount. Helpful to run.

name: Single Room
traits: Single Room: Boarding in a hotel for one littling.

name: Stylist's Bag
traits: Stylist's Bag: Helpful to raise your level of Decorum.

name: Telescope
traits: Telescope: Helpful to look far away.

name: Tent
traits: Tent: Practical tent for 2 to 4 littlings. Easy to assemble, but not to disassemble.

name: Theater Ticket
traits: Theater Ticket: Valid for one littling. Numbered seats.

name: Toolbox
traits: Toolbox: Helpful to repair items or build Gadgets.

name: Bettle Companion
traits: Bettle Companion: Helpful to climb or break objects.

name: Bumblebee Companion
traits: Bumblebee Companion: Helpful to keep your balance or retrieve small items. It allows you to hit targets within Short Range as you would with a Thrown Weapon.

name: Gecko Companion
traits: Gecko Companion: Helpful to distract, grab or hide small objects, or cheat at games.

name: Mouse Companion
traits: Mouse Companion: Helpful to follow trails, recover items, and find help.
